meanings.definition: The act of stealing; the wrongful taking and carrying away of personal property.
meanings.sent1: Thefts can lead to serious consequences.
meanings.sent2: Thefts are a common problem in big cities.
meanings.sent3: The clown joked about the thefts of his red nose.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt heavy with the weight of the thefts she witnessed.
meanings.sent5: Thefts in broad daylight shocked the small town residents.

meanings.sent1: She reported the thefts of her jewelry to the police.
meanings.sent2: Thefts of valuable items can be devastating for the owners.
meanings.sent3: The detective found humor in the thefts of the fake jewels.
meanings.sent4: The thefts of innocence haunted her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The sudden thefts of all the cookies left the children in disbelief.
